Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te piyew~rimoc n~euaggelict/c Markoc pia~poctoloc: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of the Beholder of God, the Evangelist Mark, the apostle, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
